0100001000111101 0100011000110111 1 -> sum: 1000100001110101, cout: 0

0011000011011000 0110010111100000 1 -> sum: 1001011010111001, cout: 0
1100011111100010 0011011000110010 1 -> sum: 1111111000010101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
